phrases: You are the one who gives me my future
Even on a road without signs, I will be fine, if we are together
On a journey that I cannot see ahead of, while I was lost, I found it
That my place to be is next to you
When we quarrelled, I let go of your hand again and again
I want to pull close and hold it now
You are the one who gives me my future
If I am beaten down by the rain of tears
I want to hold you, call my name immediately
I will accept sadness and bluffing in my hands
I suddenly turned my back on you and ran away
Because you have been so gentle to many other girls
Because it will not be over after this
I cannot say I am sorry, sorry
Even though I believe you, my lips are pouting
Catch me in the town where a drizzle is falling
Because I will turn around and give you a make-up kiss
You finally come back, and what is this?
It is wrong to look at your master with that kind of eyes.
I cannot hold it in anymore!
A-After asking the primogenitor, Brimir, and Mother.
How long do you two intend to sleep?
As you all know, after the Gallian Kingdom joined the fight,
the Albion army surrendered and the eight-month war ended.
The peace we have now is a result of countless sacrifices.
Let us give prayer to those who have given their lives for this country.
For the rune to be gone...
Does that mean he is not my familiar anymore?
Did you eat something to upset your stomach?
What is with that attitude when I am actually worried about you?
Next, regarding our plan for classes,
first-years will go through basic spell...
But Partner, does not this take a load off your shoulders?
You do not have to get yelled at by that aristocrat girl anymore.
There is nothing to be sad about.
I am glad to see you are well.
It is been a while, um...
I am glad to see you are doing well too, Cattleya-san.
We are here just to get Louise.
So Saito is a mere plebeian now.
Is not a contract with a familiar a lifelong thing?
Is it something that can disappear that easily?
The war's over, so you need a respite.
If you need a familiar, just summon another one that is more suitable for a Valliere.
First of all, I hate that plebeian's dog-like vulgar face!
You are attached to this familiar that much?
T-That is none of your concern.
What did you just say to me?
I am sorry when you are occupied.
I, captain of the Musketeer Force, Agnes, am here to convey the words of the Queen.
Louise FranCoise Le Blanc de La Valliere.
Report to the castle at once.
If you do not want to be with me, just say so.
What is this all of a sudden?
If the rune's gone, it means your contract as my familiar is over!
So there is nothing that ties us together!
You do not like being bossed around by a master like me, do you?
You belong to a different world to begin with.
You do not have to be with me.
I am asking you, where is this talk coming from?!
What do you think I went through to come back to you?
And now you tell me to do whatever I like?
You do not understand a thing about how I feel!
I was just being considerate for you!
Let us take a short break.
Do not wander off too far.
If you do not, then do not talk to me.
Why am I so worked up over one familiar?
So what if he is not my familiar anymore?
I just have to summon another one.
Like Nee-sama said, summon another one more appropriate for a Valliere.
Even if he is not my familiar, would he choose to be with me?
Why do I have to go through all of this?
Nice to meet you, Miss Valliere.
You, who wields the great Void magic.
My doll stabbing you would be faster than you chanting a spell.
I am here to fetch you.
My master is seeking a cute mage.
Do not mess around with me!
I have the ability to control every magic item in existence.
What do you want from me?!
First, you are not the only Void mage.
The same applies to the familiar.
Do you want to know more?
I am called the Mind of God.
As you have guessed, I am a Void mage's familiar.
The familiar of a very noble man.
You start chanting the Void magic.
No longer your familiar nor Gandalfr, you want to say?
It is only natural for a man to protect the girl he likes.
Just leave your life in my hands!
I just said all that, but I am -
I am just an ordinary human!
You have stalled an army of seventy thousand!
Who is the one who said to leave a life in his hands?
I said I would protect Louise!
That boy should not be her familiar anymore.
We do not have all the pieces we need yet.
To enjoy the game, we need all the necessary pieces.
I trust you will do this correctly.
You have to stay right by me!
The war caused my room to empty.
I sold all the furniture to support the war even a little.
Even you went through such a sacrifice?
I was about to lose you instead.
Not only did I try to take advantage of your strength, but I was also about to kill you.
I do not know how to apologise.
Princess, please do not mind it.
No matter how many times I thank you,
it would not be enough to express my appreciation.
W-Well, it is just how things went.
You are the hero who saved this Tristain.
That admits you to be a Chevalier.
A letter of appointment to be my knight.
A hero deserves an honour befitting the deed.
You will accept it, will not you, Saito-san?
To be honest, I have no clue what this means.
It means you will become an aristocrat!
Right now, I am an ordinary human without any power.
I am not even sure if I can protect Louise alone.
I do not think I can take the role of Chevalier.
His heart stopped once in the war.
I am guessing the contract was nullified then.
Then how did you come back to life?
Well... I was saved by a fairy.
She had a magic ring on her finger.
That is what happened in a nutshell.
In Albion Kingdom, South Gotha province, village of Westwood.
Go to the village and find Tifania-san.
It would be easier if I went.
What is the point of you going when you no longer have the power of the rune.
What do you plan on doing if you get attacked again?
Another Void mage and his familiar, eh?
Since I am no longer a familiar, this all might mean nothing to me now.
You will catch a cold like that!
Come on, let us go inside.
You are the one who left me alone.
Come on now, let us go.
I thought I could not see you again!
I have so many things I want to tell you, but you keep disappearing!
You were not there when I woke up on the ship...
You were not there when I woke up in bed at school...
I cannot forgive you at all.
I thought you had left without telling me again.
I will not go anywhere anymore.
I do not care if you are not my familiar...
I do not care if you do not have Gandalfr's power...
I wonder if that is really all right.
What good am I if I cannot protect you in an emergency?
Is it possible to bind the contract again?
I have never heard of it being done before.
I do not have a clue what may happen.
What if another familiar shows up?
What if you get sent to an unknown place?
We will deal with it when it happens.
In fact, that will not even happen.
I came to this world to be your familiar, did not I?
The contract is important on its own, but something is even more important...
Simply a man and a woman is enough, right?
You love me, and I love you.
What do we need more than that?
I never said I love you!
We promised this morning, did not we?
T-The sun is about to rise, too!
I have not done my prayers yet.
Stay there and cool your head until morning.
Hurry up or we are leaving you behind!
You suffice as a water flea!
Also, I will have you keep up by running.
Y-You have got to be kidding me!
I mean, please let me on!
Tell me what exactly you were doing behind my back!
I will not forgive you if you look away.
